channel.title: R Package on xiaoni's blog
channel.description: Recent content in R Package on xiaoni's blog

item.title: Analysis, visualization, and integration of spatial datasets with Seurat
item.description:
how to use Seurat to analyze spatially-resolved RNA-seq data?

Herein, the tutorial will cover these tasks:

  • Normalization

  • Dimensional reduction and clustering

  • Detecting spatially-variable features

  • Interactive visualization

  • Integration with single-cell RNA-seq data

  • Working with multiple slices

item.title: Using Seurat with multimodal data
item.description:
The ability to make simultaneous measurements of multiple data types from the same cell, known as multimodal analysis, represents a new and exciting frontier for single-cell genomics. Seurat4 to enable for the seamless storage, analysis, and exploration of diverse multimodal single-cell datasets.

Herein, I will follow the official Tutorial to analyze multimodal using Seurat data step by step.

item.title: The way to use R in Google Colab
item.description:
Colab is an interactive notebook provided by Google (primarily) for writing and running Python through a browser.

Then, how to use R in Google Colab?
